oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alvin C. York story -- Jesse Lasky, son, writers

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Historic sites; Clothing & dress
Ganier, Albert Franklin, 1883-1973; York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Sergeant York (Motion picture); Lasky, Jesse L., 1880-1958; Lasky, William R., 1921-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Seven unidentified persons (three women and four men). According to information attached to photograph one of the men is Jesse Louis Lasky and another is his son, William Raymond Lasky. The older man in double-breasted suit is probably the senior Lasky.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert Franklin Ganier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph is part of the research conducted for Warner Brothers Studio in preparation for the filming of the motion picture, "Sergeant York."
